```{r}

statcan_budget_fy <- statcan_budget %>% 
  select(pgm = "Program(s) and Internal Services",
         fy14 = "2013-14 Actual Spending (authorities used)",
         fy15 = "2014-15 Actual Spending (authorities used)",
         fy16 = "2015-16 Actual Spending (authorities used)",
         fy17 = "2015-16 Actual Spending (authorities used)",
         fy18 = "2017-18 Planned Spending") 

statcan_budget_fy %>% 
  filter(pgm == "Censuses") %>% 
  pivot_longer(-pgm, names_to = "fiscal_year", values_to = "expenditure") %>% 
  mutate(expenditure_bc_share = expenditure * 0.135) %>% 
  summarise(total_cost = sum(expenditure),
            total_cost_bc = sum(expenditure_bc_share),
            total_cost_bc_annum = sum(expenditure_bc_share)/5)

```
